name: Talk_EyeBoy
_source: speak;EyeBoy;Hmm...these medical supplies have magic in them.|Basic healing magic, but it works.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You found those supplies?|That was so kind of you!
speak;EyeBoy;Don't get the wrong idea.|I was just studying the magic.|It's not my fault they can heal people too.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;But you still brought them over to help.
speak;EyeBoy;I need living test subjects.|Dead ones don't give good data.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;This manual labor is beneath me.|But I am learning interesting things how humans use tools...;;;noir;;white

speak;EyeBoy;That and I am studying how humans work all together.|Their reactions to each other are....Very interesting.|Especially when I see someone becoming happy from completing their tasks.|It makes for great research material.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Is that the only reason you're helping?
speak;EyeBoy;...Maybe.|I've noticed that when people are happy, they answer my questions better.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;Water carries magic really well.|This bridge repair gives me good research data.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You've been helping with the bridge?
speak;EyeBoy;I've been checking the structure with magic.|Way better than your crude hammering.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;But you're still helping with the work.
speak;EyeBoy;My way is smarter.|Though I have to admit...seeing it work is kind of satisfying.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Do you actually like being helpful, {v:EyeBoyName}?
speak;EyeBoy;Don't be crazy!|This is all for my desire of knowledge!....;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;The ocean's magic flows are really complex.|The way the tides affect mana is fascinating.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;"Like" is an emotion.|I find it intellectually interesting.|The salt water and magic interaction is...captivating.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You sound almost peaceful when you talk about it.
speak;EyeBoy;Peace just means no distractions.|Though I admit this place is good for research.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Maybe knowledge can be beautiful too.
speak;EyeBoy;I can see way farther than you can.|I've spotted seventeen threats you all missed.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;I'm doing surveillance research.|If it happens to protect you, that's just a side effect.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Your research seems to help us a lot.
speak;EyeBoy;Just a coincidence.|Though I guess keeping test subjects alive is important for... |Research reasons.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;I suppose I must be thankful then, {v:EyeBoyName}.
speak;EyeBoy;Ugh, the dark energy here is overwhelming.|My magic sense makes this place unbearable.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;I'm getting magical feedback from all the corruption.|It's... enlightening, but it hurts.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;The darkenss here is hurting you?...
speak;EyeBoy;Having better magical senses has downsides.|But the knowledge I'm getting from this pain is priceless.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Please be careful....|I don't want you to get hurt....
speak;EyeBoy;These bones have fascinating death magic residue.|Each one tells a story of corruption and decay.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;Death is just another form of magic change.|Though...these deaths seem unnecessarily sad.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Do you feel sorry for them?
speak;EyeBoy;I feel...disappointed by the waste.|They could have taught us so much more about magic.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;Bah, all these blasted ballistas!|They drive me mad!;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You do make for an easy target for them...
speak;EyeBoy;Hmph!...|Oh the joy I get when I see them get blown away!;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Well, thank you for helping take care of them when you can.
speak;EyeBoy;You don't need to thank me.|Though...I guess it's nice that you notice my work.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You do like being appreciated, don't you?
speak;EyeBoy;Hmph!|I'm just happy to see another ballista out of commision!;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;I'm checking the magic signatures under this rubble.|There are some interesting things hidden here.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;A few items with minor magic.|I suppose they might be useful for your non-magical needs too.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;I suppose Jehanna would have some hard to find trinkets.
speak;EyeBoy;Indeed, now leave me be.|I need to concentrate.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;What dreadful heat in this blasted desert...|I'm sweating so much...;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;Of course we do.|Though I guess you would call it "crying" for humans.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;So you cry when you sweat?|It does look like you are crying...
speak;EyeBoy;No!|Sweating looks like I'm crying!|I'm not crying at all!;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;So this is your home of Renais, huh?;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;From a research standpoint, it's quite impressive.|Your ancestors knew architecture, that's for sure.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Do you feel at home here too?
speak;EyeBoy;"Home" is a sentimental idea.|Though...this place is good for my studies.|Maybe... adequate for long-term research.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;I'm glad you feel welcome here.
speak;EyeBoy;The corruption in Lyon is fascinating from a magic perspective.|Such power, such waste...;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;...Yes.|Well, whatever magic has hold of him...|Is beyond comprehension.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;Would be shame to lose him...|I'll see what I can do to understand this magic.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;Bah, another place that irritates my eye...;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;The heat and smoke is hard on you too, {v:EyeBoyName}?
speak;EyeBoy;My magic needs good conditions.|This environment is terrible for thinking.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Here, stay in the shade with us.
speak;EyeBoy;That's logical.|I need to maintain peak research ability...|Thank you...;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;We all need to take care of each other.
speak;EyeBoy;I was processing all the research data I've collected.|You interrupted my analysis.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;Rest is for lesser minds.|I was doing deep thinking about our mission.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;That this journey is almost over.|The magic patterns suggest big revelations ahead.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You sound almost ominous when you say that.
speak;Eirika;{v:EyeBoyName}...|I know we weren't too close, but...|I'm glad you were with us this whole journey.
speak;EyeBoy;Well...|Your expedition has been...adequate for my research.|Though you could have visited some places with more books.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Well, as long as you've learnt something.|It coudln't have been that bad, he he!
speak;EyeBoy;I did learn a thing or two.|If only I could take your lessons in book form...;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Is that your way of saying you'll miss me?
speak;EyeBoy;...Future research will be less...complete without you around.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;So you're the...floating eye creature Eirika mentioned.|Strange ally.
speak;EyeBoy;I'm {v:EyeBoyName}, and I'm doing extensive magical research.|Your sister has been a decent research assistant.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Research assistant? That's one way to put it.|What exactly are you researching?
speak;EyeBoy;Combat magic, tactical spells, battlefield magic theory...|Your military strategies make excellent case studies.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;At least you're studying something useful.|Carry on, then.
speak;EyeBoy;Obviously I'll continue.|I don't need permission for research.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;The ocean's magic currents are messing with my long-range detection.|Really inconvenient for surveillance research.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Can you still keep watch effectively?
speak;EyeBoy;I'm still better than your primitive senses.|Though I admit the sea environment has...challenges.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Just do your best.|We're all adapting to new conditions.
speak;EyeBoy;I don't do my "best."|I do optimal analysis given the parameters.|There's a difference.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;Bah, the ship's motion is disrupting my magic balance.|Really annoying for research.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Seasick, {v:EyeBoyName}?|I didn't expect that from a floating eyeball.
speak;EyeBoy;It's not "sickness."|It's environmental problems affecting my magic sense.|Big difference.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Whatever you call it, you look miserable.
speak;EyeBoy;I'm experiencing bad research conditions.|Misery is an emotion I don't...acknowledge.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Try focusing on the horizon.|Sometimes that helps.
speak;EyeBoy;Excellent.|Solid ground restores my balance.|My research abilities are fully back.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;I'm operating at peak efficiency.|The sea environment was terrible for thinking.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Good to have you back at full strength.
speak;EyeBoy;"Full strength" implies I was weak before.|I was just...temporarily limited by environment.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;This burial ground has fascinating death magic residue.|Mass death has interesting magic implications.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Do you have no respect for the dead, {v:EyeBoyName}?
speak;EyeBoy;Death is just a change in magic energy.|Though...unnecessary death is a waste of potential knowledge.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Well, that sounds a little more respectful.
speak;EyeBoy;I respect the research opportunities death provides.|The emotional stuff is less important for my studies.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Hopefully you still understand the seriousness of it at least.
speak;EyeBoy;I'm doing structural analysis of this damaged building.|Several magically important artifacts under the rubble.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Finding anything useful in all that debris?
speak;EyeBoy;Multiple items with strategic and research value.|My magic methods beat crude digging.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Your magical sight is definitely an advantage.
speak;EyeBoy;Obviously.|My abilities are way better than brute force.
speak;Ephraim;Just keep finding what we need, {v:EyeBoyName}.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;I'm monitoring multiple magic frequencies for threats.|My surveillance is way better than normal methods.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;I'm doing comprehensive area analysis.|If my research protects your tactical talk, that's just efficient.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Your research always seems to help us out.
speak;EyeBoy;Successful military operations give me better research opportunities.|Failed campaigns give no data.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Keep up the good work, then.
speak;EyeBoy;This fortress has remarkable architecture.|The stonework is quite sophisticated.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;This is Renais Castle, my family home.|What's your assessment?
speak;EyeBoy;From a strategic perspective, the defenses are impressive.|Your ancestors knew warfare.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;I only give accurate analysis.|Though I admit...this environment is good for advanced research.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Glad you approve of our family castle.
speak;EyeBoy;The magical corruption in Lyon is absolutely fascinating.|Such power, such tragic misuse of potential...;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Lyon was our childhood friend, {v:EyeBoyName}.|Show some respect.
speak;EyeBoy;I do respect that power he had.|So unknown, but so overwhelming...
speak;EyeBoy;I mourn the loss of potential knowledge.|He could have contributed so much to magical understanding.|Instead... this.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;Bah, another place that irritates my eye...;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;The heat and smoke is hard on you too, {v:EyeBoyName}?
speak;EyeBoy;My magic needs good conditions.|This environment is terrible for thinking.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Here, stay in the shade with us.
speak;EyeBoy;That's logical.|I need to maintain peak research ability...|Thank you...;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;We all need to take care of each other.
speak;EyeBoy;I was doing deep analysis of accumulated battlefield data.|You interrupted my calculations.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;I don't "rest."|I was processing complex magic patterns and strategic implications.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;And what did your analysis conclude?
speak;EyeBoy;That we're approaching a critical nexus of magical forces.|The final confrontation will be... theoretically significant.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Hopefully we're ready for whatever's coming.
speak;Ephraim;{v:EyeBoyName}...you've been studying this conflict for a long time.|What's your final assessment?
speak;EyeBoy;From a tactical perspective, your leadership has provided excellent research data.|The strategic applications have been...illuminating.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;That's high praise from someone as critical as you.
speak;EyeBoy;I only give accurate analysis.|Though I admit...this expedition has exceeded my research expectations.;;;noir;;white
speak;EyeBoy;I anticipate the ultimate magical confrontation will provide unprecedented research opportunities.|Most...satisfactory.;;;noir;;white
